item.title: BlockSpin Codes (October 2025)
item.content:encoded:
Use the following Roblox BlockSpin monthly redeem codes for October 2025 to get your hands on the best firearms, lots of free cash, and plenty of cases.

Thriving as a gangster or good citizen in BlockSpin is a survival test for the fittest. You must level up your avatar to become the strongest on the map. Skills such as Stamina, Self Stocker, Janitor, Fishing, Farming, Cook, and Swiper determine your gameplay efficiency. However, for a smooth progress, you’ll need the finest weapons and vehicles. This is when you should redeem the active BlockSpin codes.

These Roblox promo codes are easy to use and will grant you thousands of Cash, in-game currency, without the heavy-duty grinding. You can also redeem free Cases via these codes and add the best firearms to your inventory. 

Active BlockSpin Codes 

Inactive BlockSpin Codes

  • BJZ9C1
  • C5026Q
  • I70IIH
  • 19OC9L

  • 6F1776
  • KHU619

How To Redeem BlockSpin Codes

Follow the steps listed below to redeem all the active codes in BlockSpin:

  1. Launch BlockSpin and land on the map. 
  2. Press the black icon on the right side of the screen. 
  3. Select “Codes” to open the code box. 
  4. Enter the code in the “Enter Game Code” text box. 
  5. Activate the code by clicking the “Redeem” button. 

More About BlockSpin Codes

Purchase the Ammo and Weapon Cases using the free Cash obtained from the active codes. Players are advised to open the Superior and Elite Weapon Cases. The following are the odds of all the weapons from the Superior Case and Elite Case in BlockSpin:

Here are all the Ammo Cases with their price list:

FAQs On BlockSpin Codes

What are the latest active codes?

“BLOCKSPIN_GRIPS_UPDATE” and “UNDER_THE_BARREL” are the latest codes in BlockSpin, both of which were released through the game’s official Discord server. 

Does any code offer free vehicles?

As of now, none of the active codes for BlockSpin can be redeemed for free vehicles. 

What codes offer the maximum amount of Cases?

“UNDER_THE_BARREL” is the only BlockSpin code that offers 10 Cases upon redemption.

item.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 4 Might Be Renamed to ‘Sonic CD’
item.content:encoded:
It has been claimed by a prolific insider that Paramount is considering a name change for the Sonic the Hedgehog 4 movie, slated to hit the big screen in March 2027. In recent reports, it was suggested that the film and television titan is looking to rebrand the movie to ‘Sonic CD’, in reference to the classic game of the same name.

There aren’t many details around the fourth movie in the Sonic the Hedgehog series, which is in a pre-production state at present. It follows Sonic the Hedgehog 3, released in December 2024, and will make the film franchise, which started in February 2020, a quadrilogy.

Sonic CD Could Feature Time Travel Elements

Industry insider DanielRPK has claimed that Paramount will mull over a name change for Sonic the Hedgehog 4. It has been suggested that ‘Sonic CD’ is the most likely pick for a new title going forward, breaking the naming convention trend that has existed since the run-up to the first film’s release in 2020.

It was earlier suggested by DanielRPK (reported by MaxBlizz) that Sonic the Hedgehog 4 will feature ‘a time-travel plot’, which is taken straight out of Sonic CD, released way back in 1993.

It’ll likely be confirmed either way soon, as filming is set to begin in the coming months, and the studio is working with a slated release date of March 19, 2027.

In the recent Sonic space, it was confirmed that Sonic Rumble, a party royale game with a stunning character roster, is headed to mobile and PC platforms in early November, dropping worldwide on the fifth.

Earlier this month, a new Shadow the Hedgehog trademark was quietly filed by SEGA, but nobody knew why.

Let me know on the Insider Gaming Discord server if you’re excited about the prospect of a Sonic CD movie.

For more Insider Gaming coverage, check out the news that The White House has used AI to turn President Trump into Master Chief

SUBSCRIBE to our newsletter to receive the latest news and exclusive leaks every week! No Spam.

item.title: The White House Uses AI To Turn Donald Trump into Master Chief
item.content:encoded:
It’s not a title we thought we’d be sharing today, but here we are. In a recent post on social media, The White House published an image of President Donald Trump, now embodying Halo’s Master Chief, saluting the American flag. In his hand is grasped an energy sword, and in the background sits the House itself.

The post was published in response to GameStop declaring the end of all console wars as Halo prepares to be released on PlayStation for the first time. In a way, The White House is probably suggesting that President Trump ended this war, too.

Commander in (Master) Chief

Halo: Campaign Evolved was recently revealed by Halo Studios during the Halo World Championship event. As Halo Infinite comes to a close, other projects are emerging, including this Unreal Engine 5 reimagination of the game that kickstarted the series back in 2001 on the original Xbox platform.

Back in August, dataminers and eagle-eyed fans of the sci-fi franchise were finding references to PlayStation ‘compatible’ Halo games. We now know that the references were pointing to Halo: Campaign Evolved.

Sadly, some gamers are finding out about the existence of this game by way of The White House, using AI to generate an image of President Trump in full Spartan garb as Master Chief:

Donald Trump recently shared a video (not created by him) showing him flying a fighter jet and dumping a mysterious brown liquid over protestors in a jab at the No Kings movement. That was also an AI construct, and the sharing of the clip was met with backlash from more than a few people.

One such person who took offense to the clip was Kenny Loggins, the artist behind Danger Zone, a song synonymous with Top Gun and featured in the clip circulated by Trump.

Do you think The White House is wrong for using AI to replicate Halo like this, or is it not that deep? Let me know what you’re thinking on the Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more Insider Gaming coverage, check out the news that images of a cancelled multiplayer God of War game have surfaced

SUBSCRIBE to our newsletter to receive the latest news and exclusive leaks every week! No Spam.

item.title: NYT Connections Hints Today (#869)—Clues and Answers for Monday, October 27
item.content:encoded:
It’s a new week, and that means seven fresh opportunities to keep your NYT Connections streak going await. Today’s puzzle is a great way to get your brain whirring as you wake up for a new Monday morning, and whatever challenges the day will bring.

Fortunately, I’m here again with the best NYT Connections hints and solutions that you need to ace today’s puzzle. Read on to get hte answers you need.

What is NYT Connections?

It would be remiss of me not to give a little foundational backstory before leaping into today’s NYT Connections clues and hints.

In June 2023, NYT Connections emerged as yet another game in the ever-growing New York Times lineup. This title soared immediately, and it’s easy to see why. As a free-to-play, accessible New York Times game, NYT Connections is available to users worldwide and can be played on either desktop devices or via a mobile app.

Playing NYT Connections on your commute or while waiting for a coffee is a fantastic way to kill a few minutes.

But how do you play NYT Connections?

It’s relatively simple, and that’s why it’s the best New York Times game, in my opinion.

The NYT team will provide you with a grid of 16 words once a day. The only task left up to you is to sort those words into four groups of four by finding their commonalities. Every NYT Connections puzzle has just one solution, and some words might have a double meaning, so it can sometimes be tricky to figure out the answers.

It’s also important to stress that the words are color-coded: yellow, blue, green, and purple. That’s in order of difficulty from least to most difficult, too.

What’s critical here is that you get four guesses every day, and if you use those, your NYT Connections answers for today will be out of reach, as it’ll be game over.

Today’s NYT Connections Hints (October 27)

If you want to figure out today’s NYT Connections clues without getting the answers outright, I’ll start with the words themselves. Perhaps just seeing the words here will spur your brain into action, and you’ll spot the trends immediately.

Here are the NYT Connections words from today’s puzzle, #869:

  • ONLY
  • CONNECT
  • OLIVE
  • BRANCH
  • FAB
  • FAN
  • JUST
  • TWIST
  • FANTASTIC
  • SIMPLY
  • CHERRY
  • SPREAD
  • RADIATE
  • MINT
  • PETIT
  • MERELY

And here are the hints I can offer for today’s NYT Connections:

  • Yellow – These words all describe ways something can extend or disperse outward
  • Green – Each of these words minimizes or qualifies something
  • Blue – Classic bar-top embellishments
  • Purple – Famous groupings or phrases that end in “Four”

Here’s the final warning before we get to the NYT Connections answers for today, October 27.

Are you sure you want to scroll further?

Very well!

NYT Connections Answers for Today, October 27 (#869)

If you want to jump straight to the answers for today’s NYT Connections puzzle, I’ve got you covered:

  • Yellow – BRANCH, FAN, RADIATE, SPREAD
  • Green – JUST, MERELY, ONLY, SIMPLY
  • Blue – CHERRY, MINT, OLIVE, TWIST
  • Purple – CONNECT, FAB, FANTASTIC, PETIT

When Does NYT Connections Reset?

That’s today’s puzzle, but if you want the next one, the game resets daily at midnight local time (that’s your local time). You’ll have 24 hours to complete the puzzle when midnight ticks over in your timezone.

How did you do? Did you get a perfect run? Let me know what your streak looks like on the Insider Gaming Discord server

SUBSCRIBE to our newsletter to receive the latest news and exclusive leaks every week! No Spam.
